original_title: ‘Protecting farmers and fishermen my only challenge’ – Namal
original_body_lines: The presidential candidate of the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna (SLPP), MP Namal Rajapaksa, stated that protecting the country’s farmers and fishermen is his only challenge.
Speaking at a public rally in Vavuniya, he also emphasized that his government would work to resolve the human-elephant conflict.
